name: RxBotics
body:
### Welcome to RxBotics

It has only just begun but the dream is to create a fully functioning robotics controller framework using nothing but Javascript. This framework is initially going to be designed to work with [Bonescript](https://github.com/jadonk/bonescript) for the [BeagleBone Black](http://beagleboard.org/black), but who knows what the future may hold!

There is a wonderful course [Control of Mobile Robots](https://www.coursera.org/course/conrob) which has inspired me along this path, I recommend anyone interested to take a look. There is also instructions in that course on how to make a robot to use this framework with.

This is early days, but watch this space!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
